cluster_classes.class_description: Abstract ideas referring to phenomena beyond normal scientific explanation, including the general notion of the supernatural, the paranormal, and questions about their reality.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: the supernatural or paranormal... leaving listeners to wonder about the existence of the supernatural

members.entity_description: Phenomena or entities believed to exist beyond or outside the laws of nature and normal scientific understanding, often featured in urban legends.
Events or phenomena that appear beyond normal scientific explanation, often linked to ghosts or hauntings.
Question of whether supernatural phenomena are real in listenersâ€™ own lives.

cluster_classes.class_description: Specific entities, locations, or visual forms through which the supernatural is believed to appear in urban legends, such as haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Stories of haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures have captivated audiences

members.entity_description: Houses believed to be inhabited or influenced by spirits or ghosts, often with dark or tragic pasts, commonly featured as locations in supernatural urban legends and folklore.
Unexplained or fantastical beings that appear as central entities in urban legend narratives.
Perceived visual manifestations of ghosts or spirits in urban legend narratives.

args.new_description: Abstract ideas referring to supernatural and paranormal phenomena in urban legends, including the general notion of the supernatural, the paranormal, and questions about their reality.
args.justification: This class cleanly represents high-level ideas about the supernatural and paranormal, which are closely related to but distinct from specific manifestations; assigning a shared Class_Group with the manifestations class clarifies their relationship while keeping them separate by abstraction level.

args.new_description: Specific entities, locations, and visual or creaturely forms through which the supernatural and paranormal are believed to appear in urban legends, such as haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures.
args.justification: This class consistently groups concrete manifestations (places, apparitions, creatures) of the supernatural and paranormal; assigning the same Class_Group as the abstract concepts class links them under a coherent domain while preserving a useful conceptual vs. manifestation distinction.

executed_decisions.justification: This class cleanly represents high-level ideas about the supernatural and paranormal, which are closely related to but distinct from specific manifestations; assigning a shared Class_Group with the manifestations class clarifies their relationship while keeping them separate by abstraction level.

executed_decisions.new_description: Specific entities, locations, and visual or creaturely forms through which the supernatural and paranormal are believed to appear in urban legends, such as haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures.
executed_decisions.justification: This class consistently groups concrete manifestations (places, apparitions, creatures) of the supernatural and paranormal; assigning the same Class_Group as the abstract concepts class links them under a coherent domain while preserving a useful conceptual vs. manifestation distinction.
